start.title: Prologue: The Oath
start.speaker: Narrator
text: The moon sits low over the sleeping city of Kurogane — steel and shadow in equal measure.
You are Akio, once a student of the Bladeway, now a traveler bound by an oath: to defend those who cannot.
A whisper arrives on the wind. Tonight the tournament begins.
Your story begins at a lantern-lit gate.

meet_mentor.title: A Familiar Voice
meet_mentor.speaker: Mentor
text: An old mentor, Master Sora, greets you with a nod. 'You seek purpose, child. The arena will test you.'
'Learn this: strength without restraint becomes a prison.'

tourney_info.title: The Tournament
tourney_info.speaker: Mentor
text: Master Sora explains: 'The Ember Tournament crowns the strongest — but also peels secrets away.'
'There is prize and there is risk. Choose your path: honor, power, or cunning.'

training_1.title: Training Begins
training_1.speaker: Mentor
text: You spend days training under Sora...

training_speed.title: Speed Drills
training_speed.speaker: Mentor
text: Your footwork becomes whisper-quick...

training_defense.title: The Guard
training_defense.speaker: Mentor
text: You learn to absorb momentum...

rival_approach.title: Rivalry Sparks
rival_approach.speaker: Rival
text: Rin steps forward. 'I heard about your training...'

spar_rin.title: Spar with Rin
spar_rin.speaker: Narrator
text: The spar is fast and precise...

spar_test.title: Practice Spar
spar_test.speaker: Narrator
text: A local sparring partner tests your counters...

path_honor.title: The Path of Honor
path_honor.speaker: Narrator
text: You choose honor...

path_power.title: The Path of Power
path_power.speaker: Narrator
text: You choose power...

path_cunning.title: The Path of Cunning
path_cunning.speaker: Narrator
text: You choose cunning...

shadow_teacher.title: Teacher in the Dark
shadow_teacher.speaker: Stranger
text: A hooded figure offers the Nightshard...

corrupt_path.title: Whispers of Corruption
corrupt_path.speaker: Narrator
text: The Nightshard flows through your veins like ice.

learn_deception.title: Learning Deceit
learn_deception.speaker: Stranger
text: You learn to read intentions...

make_allies.title: Brokering Alliances
make_allies.speaker: Narrator
text: You forge a pact with a merchant...

ally_event.title: Call to Aid
ally_event.speaker: Mentor
text: Your allies ask for a favor...

caravan_defend.title: Ambush
caravan_defend.speaker: Narrator
text: Bandits strike the caravan...

tourney_start.title: Tournament Gates
tourney_start.speaker: Announcer
text: The Ember Tournament podiums glow...

match_1.title: Round One
match_1.speaker: Announcer
text: Your first opponent is a novice...

match_2.title: Round Two
match_2.speaker: Announcer
text: The crowd roars...

match_2_speed.title: Speed vs Feint
match_2_speed.speaker: Narrator
text: You close gaps and land a feather strike...

match_2_defense.title: Counter Mastery
match_2_defense.speaker: Narrator
text: You bait a feint...

quarter_1.title: Quarterfinal
quarter_1.speaker: Announcer
text: The quarterfinals bring a test of endurance...

silent_blade.title: Silent Blade
silent_blade.speaker: Enemy
text: A masked fighter approaches...

silent_fight.title: Strike and Hold
silent_fight.speaker: Narrator
text: You trade blows...

unmask_attempt.title: The Mask Shifts
unmask_attempt.speaker: Narrator
text: You attempt to unmask mid-fight...

choices.text: Exploit the shock and press the attack

rival_battle.title: Rin Revealed
rival_battle.speaker: Rival
text: Rin fights with personal fury...

reason_with_rin.title: Words in the Ring
reason_with_rin.speaker: Player
text: You speak: 'Why challenge in secret? We are better than this.'

rival_end_win.title: Rin Bested
rival_end_win.speaker: Narrator
text: Your strike lands true...

rival_end_talk.title: A Fragile Truce
rival_end_talk.speaker: Narrator
text: Talking yields a fragile truce...

rival_alliance.title: Rin's Debt
rival_alliance.speaker: Rival
text: Rin accepts your aid...

semifinal.title: Semifinals
semifinal.speaker: Announcer
text: Semifinals demand focus...

champ_fight.title: Merchant's Champion
champ_fight.speaker: Enemy
text: Clad in odd armor...

champ_win.title: Gadgetry Overcome
champ_win.speaker: Narrator
text: You break the champion's rhythm...

champ_lose.title: A Misstep
champ_lose.speaker: Narrator
text: Your brute force is outmaneuvered...

choices.text: Regroup and try again next year

final_prep.title: Final Preparations
final_prep.speaker: Mentor
text: Only one day remains before the finals...

final_choice_honor.title: Final - Honor
final_choice_honor.speaker: Narrator
text: You step into the final ring with a clear heart...

final_choice_power.title: Final - Power
final_choice_power.speaker: Narrator
text: You unleash forbidden strength...

final_choice_cunning.title: Final - Cunning
final_choice_cunning.speaker: Narrator
text: You use tricks and an elaborate ruse to win...

ending_legend.title: Legend of Mercy
ending_legend.speaker: Narrator
text: You become a legend...

ending_tyrant.title: Crown of Ash
ending_tyrant.speaker: Narrator
text: You are feared and powerful...

ending_exile.title: Shadow's Price
ending_exile.speaker: Narrator
text: You win through cunning...

epilogue_defeat.title: Defeat & Reflection
epilogue_defeat.speaker: Narrator
text: Defeat offers time to grow...

shop_visit.title: The Market Stall
shop_visit.speaker: Merchant
text: At the market, a vendor sells a mysterious oil...

bought_oil.title: Sharpened
bought_oil.speaker: Narrator
text: You feel lighter, quicker...

v1.title: Vignette 1
v1.speaker: Narrator
text: The moon hides behind a cloud, and the world feels anonymous for a moment. (entry 1)

v2.title: Vignette 2
v2.speaker: Narrator
text: A stray dog follows you home, tail wagging with stubborn loyalty. (entry 2)

v3.title: Vignette 3
v3.speaker: Narrator
text: A tune from a distant flute calls forth a memory of lost youth. (entry 3)

v4.title: Vignette 4
v4.speaker: Narrator
text: An old letter arrives, its ink faded. The name at the top tugs at a memory. (entry 4)

v5.title: Vignette 5
v5.speaker: Narrator
text: A merchant offers news from the Eastern Isles — rumors of war. (entry 5)
